pay(address).details: Callable by anyone to trigger payout of earnings for ease-of-operations.

payWithAmount(address,uint256).details: Callable by anyone to trigger payout of earnings for ease-of-operations.

affiliate().notice: The address of the affiliate receiving the earnings.

pay(address).notice: Pays out the earnings to the platform and affiliate.

payVault().notice: The address of the vault that earnings are paid to on behalf of the affiliate.

payWithAmount(address,uint256).notice: Pays out an amount of earnings to the platform and affiliate for a given vault.

platformVault().notice: The address of the vault that earnings are paid to on behalf of the platform.

splitConfig().notice: The address of the affiliate split config.
